other_tests.findings: Acanthamoeba cysts found in the cornea in 4 eyes; chronic chorioretinal inflammation with perivascular lymphocytic infiltration and diffuse neuroretinal ischemia in 4 of 5 eyes; retinal artery thrombosis present in 3 of the 4 involved eyes; central retinal artery and vein thrombosis found in 1 eye.
